name: The Mired
content:
The Mired

A vast swamp of corrupted essence, where the ground itself writhes with malevolent energy. Primary Objectives are corrupted nexus points. Secondary markers are essence pools or corrupted shrines. The air is thick with the stench of decay and the whispers of lost souls.


Terrain Features:

  • Corrupted nexus points
  • Essence pools
  • Corrupted shrines
  • Writhing ground

Atmosphere:

The air is heavy with the stench of decay and corruption. The ground squelches underfoot, and strange lights flicker in the mist. The whispers of lost souls echo through the twisted trees.
